item.description:
We have to move this month's meeting again to the 4th Thursday, so hopefully everyone will still be able to make it.

This month's topic will be an Introduction to Adobe Edge Animate.

Adobe Edge Animate, part of Creative Cloud, is a new motion and interaction tool for creating animated, interactive content using HTML, JavaScript and CSS. Edge Animate is designed to be powerful yet approachable and easy to use.

We hope to see everyone next Thursday, April 25th!
item.name: April Manchester Adobe User Group Meeting
